actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit the attorneys general of the several States to secure redress to the citizens and political subdivisions of their States for damages and injuries sustained by reason of unlawful restraints and monopolies.

summary.text: Authorizes the attroneys general of the several States to secure redress in the district courts of the United States to the citizens and political subdivisions of their States for damages and injuries sustained by reason of unlawful restraints and monopolies.

titles.title: A bill to permit the attorneys general of the several States to secure redress to the citizens and political subdivisions of their States for damages and injuries sustained by reason of unlawful restraints and monopolies.
